org.gridlab.gridsphere.services.resource
Class ServiceLocation

java.lang.Object
  org.gridlab.gridsphere.services.common.Location
      org.gridlab.gridsphere.services.resource.ServiceLocation
Direct Known Subclasses:
WebServiceLocation
public class ServiceLocation
extends Location

Describes the location of a sevice resource. Service resources url strings look like "{serv|}://[:port][/]", where: host is either the host name or host address of the service resource; port is the port on which the service resource is running; path is the path for accessing the service resource.
